name: UIEvent.EventSubtype
desc: Specifies the subtype of the event in relation to its general type.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The event has no subtype. This is the subtype for events of the UIEvent.EventType.touches general type.

items.name: case motionShake
items.desc: The event is related to the user shaking the device. It is a subtype for the UIEvent.EventType.motion general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlPlay
items.desc: A remote-control event for playing audio or video. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlPause
items.desc: A remote-control event for pausing audio or video. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlStop
items.desc: A remote-control event for stopping audio or video from playing. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlTogglePlayPause
items.desc: A remote-control event for toggling audio or video between play and pause. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlNextTrack
items.desc: A remote-control event for skipping to the next audio or video track. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlPreviousTrack
items.desc: A remote-control event for skipping to the previous audio or video track. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlBeginSeekingBackward
items.desc: A remote-control event to start seeking backward through the audio or video medium. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlEndSeekingBackward
items.desc: A remote-control event to end seeking backward through the audio or video medium. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlBeginSeekingForward
items.desc: A remote-control event to start seeking forward through the audio or video medium. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.

items.name: case remoteControlEndSeekingForward
items.desc: A remote-control event to end seeking forward through the audio or video medium. It is a subtype of the UIEvent.EventType.remoteControl general event type.
